sentences.en: I was treated with decorum and respect throughout the investigation.
sentences.cn: 整个调查当中我受到了礼遇和尊重。

sentences.en: This is in keeping with the decorum of the game, of course.
sentences.cn: 这当然是为了在比赛中保持风度。

sentences.en: You've breached the decorum of my courtroomwith all this hooting.
sentences.cn: 你的这种叫嚣违反了本法庭的礼仪。
